title: Fluoride in the Water - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/5/19
itunes:title: Fluoride in the Water - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/5/19
description:
George Noory and chemistry professor Dr. Paul Connett explore his research into the possible health risks from adding fluoride in America's drinking water, and if there is a sinister plot behind the plan.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
